aboutUsHero.subPageHeroTitle: We’re envisioning a new approach to public safety.
aboutUsHero.subPageHeroSubtitle: Our platform offers concrete solutions that honor the dignity and human rights of all people.

left.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Vision for Justice","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights, The Leadership Conference Education Fund, and Civil Rights Corps launched Vision for Justice to serve as a north star in the movement to transform the criminal-legal system and reimagine safety in America. The platform offers concrete solutions spanning every stage of the criminal-legal process.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"More than 40 civil and human rights groups have endorsed our updated platform. Together, we are building a community of advocates, policymakers, educators, and people around the nation to hold our elected leaders accountable and amplify the urgent need for a new paradigm for public safety that truly keeps our communities safe. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"\n\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

right.raw:
{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Why you should support our vision","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Even with this comprehensive and unified approach, Vision for Justice is only a starting point. The United States leads the world in imprisoning or supervising more than 6.6 million people, while ripping parents, children, and loved ones from their families every day. This bureaucracy will not vanish overnight. Ensuring a new paradigm for public safety requires the policy solutions offered here — but it also requires your voice. We need sustained action from the streets to social media to the halls of Congress to reject white supremacy and build a system that respects the humanity, dignity, and human rights of all people.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The American criminal-legal system is a stain on our democracy.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This system replicates and reinforces patterns of racial and economic oppression that trace from slavery, including Black Codes, convict leasing, Jim Crow laws, and the War on Drugs, as well as longstanding efforts to suppress social movements protesting these and other injustices. The result is a criminal-legal bureaucracy that denies millions of people the opportunities, legal equity, and human rights that they deserve, even as it fuels the world’s highest incarceration rate. 


","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

left.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our Platform","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"heading-5","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Let’s create a society that respects the humanity, dignity, and human rights of all people.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"This platform envisions a new paradigm for public safety. We believe it not only builds a more just society, but also constitutes effective policy: When we stop using criminal “justice” policy as social policy, we make our communities safer, more equitable, and better at ensuring opportunity.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}

right.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"We propose ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-3"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Promoting liberty, equity, and accountability in the criminal-legal system","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Protecting human dignity and ensuring a restorative system of justice","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Rebuilding communities and implementing a new paradigm for public safety","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

left.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Who we are","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Our communities deserve real justice. They are ready for transformative change. That’s why our organizations decided to collaborate on Vision for Justice: to reimagine what safety can look like, and how we get there together. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

right.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Leadership Conference on Civil and Human Rights is a coalition charged by its diverse membership of more than 240 national organizations to promote and protect the civil and human rights of all persons in the United States. Through advocacy and outreach across communities, The Leadership Conference works toward an America as good as its ideals. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.civilrights.org"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learn more. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Civil Rights Corps","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Civil Rights Corps is a nonprofit organization dedicated to challenging systemic injustice in the United States’ legal system. CRC engages in advocacy and public education and specializes in innovative, systemic civil rights litigation with the goal of re-sensitizing the legal system and our culture to the injustice and brutality that characterize the contemporary U.S. legal system. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.civilrightscorps.org/"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Learn more.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

slideShowSubtitle.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Vision for Justice platform is grounded in a set of core principles that must undergird any change pursued.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"All policy changes must produce more prevention of crime and result in dramatic reduction of people in jails and prisons who don't have to be there, ending the racial and economic injustice that the current system drives and replicates.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"All policy changes, should reinvest saved dollars from reducing the size of the criminal-legal system into the communities that have been most harmed by the failure to invest in better schools, more jobs, counseling, and mental health services, which has driven the problem in the first place. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"P","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"olicy changes must center human rights and be rooted in holistic strategies to improve the health, welfare, and genuine safety of communities.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"P","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"olicy changes should involve a participatory decision-making process that empowers community members to provide greater direction on priorities to build community opportunities and greater oversight, accountability, and influence over community safety priorities and activities.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While not all policies may be implementable simultaneously, policy change must be comprehensive; a truly meaningful overhaul requires a plan and goal of ultimately implementing all these suggested changes, as well as simultaneously implementing those steps that must be taken together to be effective. This platform should be seen as a unified prescription, not a menu of options, even while choices may need to be made about sequencing.  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"All policy changes must be intersectional. Although this platform highlights the experiences of Black, Brown, and low-income communities, we recognize that within and beyond these communities lies great diversity that compounds disparities within the criminal-legal system, including diversity based on sex, gender and gender identity, sexual orientation, immigration status, disability, HIV status, and involvement in underground economies. Our goal is to build a system that respects the dignity, rights, and humanity of ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"all ","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"people.  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"All policy changes must result in expanding anti-racist impacts and preventing harm. The outcomes should produce dignity, health, opportunity, and overall individual and community well-being no matter one's race, national origin, sexual orientation, and gender identity, or zip code.  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

leftText.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Get involved in Vision for Justice and join the movement to reimagine safety in America. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

rightText.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Explore our voting resources and learn how you can help transform the system when we vote for justice.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
